annotations.description: Truth be told this is an Alternate version of the Audrey Saunders Modern Classic and I prefer it. This cocktail was created by Audrey Saunders when she was w...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Old Cuban (Alternate Version)

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Aged Rum
.5oz (15ml) Lime Juice
.25oz (7.5ml) Cane Syrup
2 Dashes Angostura Bitters
Small handful of Mint
Top Champagne (Or Prosecco/Sparkling Wine)

Muddle in Shaker. 
Shake and pour into champagne glass. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gx6AMD6QqRM&t=9s
title: Old Cuban
